original: @51a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @51a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: de b'i t'a ra ku b'a ky'a de sha n'a ma sto tra /
analyzed: de b'i t'a ra ku b'a ky'a de sha n'a ma sto tra /
translated: Devi-taraka-kuvakaya-desana-nama-stotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: lha mo sgrol ma la sme sngags kyi gsol ba 'debs pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa /
analyzed: lha mo sgrol ma la sme sngags kyi gsol ba 'debs pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Goddess Tara, called the Prayer of the Twenty-one Homages

original: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Tara, the most venerable one.

original: phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal 'jig rten kun sgrol ma //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal 'jig rten kun sgrol ma //
translated: Homage, homage, you who liberate the whole world.

original: phyag 'tshal skyabs med phongs pa kun skyob ma //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal skyabs med phongs pa kun skyob ma //
translated: Homage, you who protect all those who have no refuge.

original: phyag 'tshal yang yang dran pas rjes 'dzin ma //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal yang yang dran pas rjes 'dzin ma //
translated: Homage, you who watch over those who remember you again and again.

original: de ring da lta mgon med bdag la skyob //
analyzed: de ring da lta mgon med bdag la skyob //
translated: Today, right now, protect me, who has no protector.

original: khyod sngon skyob pa rnam gzigs spyan chab las //
analyzed: khyod sngon skyob pa rnam gzigs spyan chab las //
translated: When you were born from the tears of Vipashyin, the protector,

original: gang 'khrungs de tshe de ma thag 'di skad //
analyzed: gang 'khrungs de tshe de ma thag 'di skad //
translated: you immediately said this:

original: srid gnas gang su 'jigs pas 'jigs 'gyur yod //
analyzed: srid gnas gang su 'jigs pas 'jigs 'gyur yod //
translated: Whoever is afraid of the terrors of existence,üîΩI will be their refuge.

original: de kun ngas skyabs zhes gsungs dam bca' dgongs //
analyzed: de kun ngas skyabs zhes gsungs dam bca' dgongs //
translated: You made this promise.

original: mkha' ltar thugs zab mkha' 'dra yi //
analyzed: mkha' ltar thugs zab mkha' 'dra yi //
translated: You have a mind as deep as space,

original: mdog 'chang 'gro la rjes brtse ma //
analyzed: mdog 'chang 'gro la rjes brtse ma //
translated: you have a color like space,üîΩyou have compassion for beings,

original: srid gnas / 'gro ba lag 'dzin par //
analyzed: srid gnas / 'gro ba lag 'dzin par //
translated: you hold the hands of those who are in existence.

original: zhal bzhes slu ba ma mdzad cig / khyod nyid rig 'dzin lha tshogs nang //
analyzed: zhal bzhes slu ba ma mdzad cig / khyod nyid rig 'dzin lha tshogs nang //
translated: You, the assembly of vidyƒÅdhara deities,

original: zag med dga' bdes rnam rol bgyid //
analyzed: zag med dga' bdes rnam rol bgyid //
translated: Revel in the undefiled bliss of joy.üîΩMy son, your subject, is being burned in the fire.

original: khyod 'bangs bu ni me nang bsreg / kye kye thogs med mkhyen ldan gzigs //
analyzed: khyod 'bangs bu ni me nang bsreg / kye kye thogs med mkhyen ldan gzigs //
translated: Oh, oh, be aware, be aware, Togma!

original: bdag rang gis ni nongs bgyis nas //
analyzed: bdag rang gis ni nongs bgyis nas //
translated: I have committed faults myself.

original: me chu dgra sogs 'jigs gyur pa'ang //
analyzed: me chu dgra sogs 'jigs gyur pa'ang //
translated: Even if I am in danger from fire, water, enemies, and so forth,

original: gal te khyod sku rjes dran gyur //
analyzed: gal te khyod sku rjes dran gyur //
translated: If I recall your body,

original: skyob mdzad lags na bdag cis min //
analyzed: skyob mdzad lags na bdag cis min //
translated: If you are the protector, why not me?üîΩYou, the one who constantly rains down the nectar

original: nyid phyag mchod sbyin bdud rtsi yi //
analyzed: nyid phyag mchod sbyin bdud rtsi yi //
translated: Of homage, offering, and generosity,

original: rgyun 'bebs yi dags 'bum phrag kyang //üîΩcig car tshim bgyid kho bo mes //
analyzed: rgyun 'bebs yi dags 'bum phrag kyang // cig car tshim bgyid kho bo mes //
translated: Even though hundreds of thousands of hungry ghostsüîΩAre simultaneously satisfied,

original: lus zhu thig le 'bebs ma lags //
analyzed: lus zhu thig le 'bebs ma lags //
translated: The fire does not rain down a drop on my body.

original: @51b yid 'ong phyag mtshan autpala rtsi //
analyzed: @51b yid 'ong phyag mtshan autpala rtsi //
translated: The beautiful sign, the lotus root,

original: mngar bsil grib ma bsil ldan pas //
analyzed: mngar bsil grib ma bsil ldan pas //
translated: The cool shade of the sweet and cool

original: cung zad reg na'ang gdung sel ma //
analyzed: cung zad reg na'ang gdung sel ma //
translated: Does not remove my torment even a little.

original: gus ldan bu bdag nyug mi mdzad //
analyzed: gus ldan bu bdag nyug mi mdzad //
translated: You do not fondle me, your devoted son.

original: thugs rjes brkyang pa'i zhabs g-yas kyi //
analyzed: thugs rjes brkyang pa'i zhabs g-yas kyi //
translated: With the right foot extended in compassion,

original: mtho bong rgyun ba zangs thur 'bebs nas //
analyzed: mtho bong rgyun ba zangs thur 'bebs nas //
translated: The copper ladle pours down

original: ngan 'gro'i gnas gsum tshim mdzad na //
analyzed: ngan 'gro'i gnas gsum tshim mdzad na //
translated: You satisfy the three lower realms,

original: phongs pa bdag cag gyi nar dor //
analyzed: phongs pa bdag cag gyi nar dor //
translated: But you abandon us, the poor.

original: ting 'dzin g-yon bskum skyil krung gi //
analyzed: ting 'dzin g-yon bskum skyil krung gi //
translated: With the dance of the left leg drawn in and cross-legged,

original: gar gyis sa gsum bde mdzad ma //
analyzed: gar gyis sa gsum bde mdzad ma //
translated: You make the three worlds happy.

original: sbrang bu mer bcug kho bo lta //
analyzed: sbrang bu mer bcug kho bo lta //
translated: Like a louse in a fire,

original: gar stabs rlung gis cis mi bskyod //
analyzed: gar stabs rlung gis cis mi bskyod //
translated: Why are you not moved by the wind of dance?

original: 'dzum zhal dgyes mas gang gzigs na //
analyzed: 'dzum zhal dgyes mas gang gzigs na //
translated: With a smiling face, what do you see?

original: phag sdig gdol pa mdze can //
analyzed: phag sdig gdol pa mdze can //
translated: A pig, a sinner, an outcaste, a leper,üîΩAnd again,

original: yang // lha gzugs sdug mdzes sgyur spyod na //
analyzed: yang // lha gzugs sdug mdzes sgyur spyod na //
translated: If you transform into a beautiful divine form,

original: kho bo gcig spyan yul ma gyur //
analyzed: kho bo gcig spyan yul ma gyur //
translated: I will not be the object of your eyes.

original: sgeg ldem 'gying mdzes gzi 'od ldan //
analyzed: sgeg ldem 'gying mdzes gzi 'od ldan //
translated: With swaying beauty, splendor, and radiance,

original: khyod sku sus mthong de don 'grub //
analyzed: khyod sku sus mthong de don 'grub //
translated: Whoever sees your body will accomplish their purpose.

original: don gnyer rtse gcig rjes slob bu //
analyzed: don gnyer rtse gcig rjes slob bu //
translated: A disciple who follows you one-pointedly with a purpose,

original: bdag la nyid gzugs ston ma lags //
analyzed: bdag la nyid gzugs ston ma lags //
translated: Do not show yourself to me.

original: khyod spyan autpala dkyus ring gis //
analyzed: khyod spyan autpala dkyus ring gis //
translated: With your eyes, long like blue lotus petals,

original: zur gzigs 'dod pa'i lhar 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: zur gzigs 'dod pa'i lhar 'drar 'gyur //
translated: You become a god of desire with a sidelong glance.üîΩYou do not know how to always remain on your seat

original: rtag tu nyid kyi gdan gnas dang // ji ltar snang yang mkhyen ma lags //
analyzed: rtag tu nyid kyi gdan gnas dang // ji ltar snang yang mkhyen ma lags //
translated: And how things appear.

original: lha snyan mda' ma sgra kun gyi //
analyzed: lha snyan mda' ma sgra kun gyi //
translated: With your divine ears, all sounds

original: rjes zhugs yul dus kun rig ma //
analyzed: rjes zhugs yul dus kun rig ma //
translated: And the one who knows all times and places.

original: kho bo nyam thag nga ros 'bod //
analyzed: kho bo nyam thag nga ros 'bod //
translated: I, a wretched one, am calling out with cries.

original: 'brug sgra brag ri ltar gyur gyi //
analyzed: 'brug sgra brag ri ltar gyur gyi //
translated: Like the sound of thunder in a rocky mountain.

original: skyob ma lha yi shangs dran pas //
analyzed: skyob ma lha yi shangs dran pas //
translated: Remembering the nose of the protector gods,

original: gang+g'a'i bye rgal dri rab bsrung //
analyzed: gang+g'a'i bye rgal dri rab bsrung //
translated: I am well protected from the dust of the Ganges.

original: bdag 'dir mes tshig sha tshil gsur //
analyzed: bdag 'dir mes tshig sha tshil gsur //
translated: Here I am, burned by fire, with flesh, fat, and bones.

original: rgya chen phyogs khyab tshor ma lags //
analyzed: rgya chen phyogs khyab tshor ma lags //
translated: I do not feel the vastness that pervades all directions.

original: thub chen ma gcig zla ba'i ljags //
analyzed: thub chen ma gcig zla ba'i ljags //
translated: The great sage, the moon of the one mother,

original: bung ba'i mchu rtse'i ro mkhyen na //
analyzed: bung ba'i mchu rtse'i ro mkhyen na //
translated: Knowing the taste at the tip of the bee's beak,

original: seng ge 'phrog byed mchod sbyin du //
analyzed: seng ge 'phrog byed mchod sbyin du //
translated: At the sacrifice of Si·πÉhaharƒ´ta,

original: ro bro ba la ljags rmongs srid //
analyzed: ro bro ba la ljags rmongs srid //
translated: The tongue may be deluded by the taste.

original: phra rab rdul brgya'i rdul bye ma //
analyzed: phra rab rdul brgya'i rdul bye ma //
translated: The sand of a hundredth part of a subtle atom,

original: rdo rje'i lus mnga' reg mkhyen ma //
analyzed: rdo rje'i lus mnga' reg mkhyen ma //
translated: Having a vajra body, knowing touch,

original: sdig rgyal khros pas me lha mchod //
analyzed: sdig rgyal khros pas me lha mchod //
translated: The angry sinful king worshipping Agni,üîΩBy what unbearable touch is it not touched?

original: mi bzad reg byed cis mi reg / phyogs dus rnam kun thogs med par //
analyzed: mi bzad reg byed cis mi reg / phyogs dus rnam kun thogs med par //
translated: In all directions and times, unobstructed,

original: ma chags ma 'dres ci dga' yang //
analyzed: ma chags ma 'dres ci dga' yang //
translated: Without attachment or mixture, whatever is pleasing,

original: mkhyen ma de ring skal ngan bdag /
analyzed: mkhyen ma de ring skal ngan bdag /
translated: The one who knows, today, this unfortunate self,

original: gnas skabs 'di 'drar gyur ma dgongs //
analyzed: gnas skabs 'di 'drar gyur ma dgongs //
translated: Do not consider it to be like this situation.

original: rang gzhan gnyis sdig rang spyod dam //
analyzed: rang gzhan gnyis sdig rang spyod dam //
translated: Whether it is my own or another‚Äôs,

original: gzhan stobs gzhan dbang gyur de yang //
analyzed: gzhan stobs gzhan dbang gyur de yang //
translated: whether it is my own doing or the power of another,

original: thabs stobs brgya mnga' khyod skyabs mdzad //
analyzed: thabs stobs brgya mnga' khyod skyabs mdzad //
translated: you, who have a hundred powers and means, protect me.

original: bdag 'dir nongs pa gang mchis grang //
analyzed: bdag 'dir nongs pa gang mchis grang //
translated: What is my fault here?

original: gcig tu gzhan la phan zhugs pas //üîΩmi ni brgya rtsa @52a * //
analyzed: gcig tu gzhan la phan zhugs pas // mi ni brgya rtsa @52a * //
translated: Since I am engaged in benefiting others in one way,

original: brgyad zhugs btsal //
analyzed: brgyad zhugs btsal //
translated: I have sought out a hundred and eight men.üîΩIn the middle of them, I am your servant, burning.

original: de dbus kho bo khyod 'bangs bsreg / kye ma yum gcig bdag g-yar tsha //
analyzed: de dbus kho bo khyod 'bangs bsreg / kye ma yum gcig bdag g-yar tsha //
translated: Alas, O mother, I am your son,

original: sngon las 'bras bu rjes gcod pa'i //
analyzed: sngon las 'bras bu rjes gcod pa'i //
translated: following the fruit of previous karma.

original: gnas gyur de dang de las kyang //
analyzed: gnas gyur de dang de las kyang //
translated: From that place and from that,

original: khyod thugs gsung dang sku 'jig bgyid //
analyzed: khyod thugs gsung dang sku 'jig bgyid //
translated: you have destroyed your mind, speech, and body.

original: de las gzhan bdag nyid cir dgongs //
analyzed: de las gzhan bdag nyid cir dgongs //
translated: What else do you think of me?

original: kyi hud khyod lha zhabs pad drung //
analyzed: kyi hud khyod lha zhabs pad drung //
translated: Alas, at the foot of your lotus feet,

original: bsil ba'i gnas nas 'bar ba'i mes //
analyzed: bsil ba'i gnas nas 'bar ba'i mes //
translated: from the cool abode, the blazing fire

original: mer brtson ji bzhin dmyal mes 'tshed //
analyzed: mer brtson ji bzhin dmyal mes 'tshed //
translated: burns me like a fire, as if I were in the fire of hell.

original: 'di ci sus khur lags zhes gsung //
analyzed: 'di ci sus khur lags zhes gsung //
translated: Who is this? Who has brought it?‚Äù

original: de bas mgon med mgon gcig ma //
analyzed: de bas mgon med mgon gcig ma //
translated: Therefore, O protector, you, the only protector of the unprotected,

original: khyod thabs thugs rje thogs med des //
analyzed: khyod thabs thugs rje thogs med des //
translated: with your unobstructed compassion and means,

original: bdag dang 'gro ba ci dga' yang //
analyzed: bdag dang 'gro ba ci dga' yang //
translated: Whatever is pleasing to me and to the world,

original: mdzad min mdzad srid khyed zhus pas //
analyzed: mdzad min mdzad srid khyed zhus pas //
translated: I ask you to do what should not be done.

original: 'on kyang kho bo 'dir tshig pas //
analyzed: 'on kyang kho bo 'dir tshig pas //
translated: Nevertheless, I am burned here.üîΩMay the thorns and afflictions of all embodied beings

original: lus can kun gyi zug rdu dang // nyon mongs sdig las tshig gyur cig / da ni su la re bar bya //
analyzed: lus can kun gyi zug rdu dang // nyon mongs sdig las tshig gyur cig / da ni su la re bar bya //
translated: Be burned, and now to whom should I hope?

original: kha che'i slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba /
analyzed: kha che'i slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba /
translated: The Kashmiri master called the omniscient MaitreyanƒÅtha,

original: mi brgya dang bdun gyis bskor ba la tsandan gyi mes bsregs pa'i tshe /
analyzed: mi brgya dang bdun gyis bskor ba la tsandan gyi mes bsregs pa'i tshe /
translated: Surrounded by one hundred and seven people, when cremated with sandalwood fire,

original: nyid kyi yi dam gyi lha rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la smre sngags kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa dang / skad cig yud tsam thang cig la 'phags ma'i phyag nas char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam babs nas /
analyzed: nyid kyi yi dam gyi lha rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la smre sngags kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa dang / skad cig yud tsam thang cig la 'phags ma'i phyag nas char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam babs nas /
translated: At that time, he supplicated his personal deity, the noble TƒÅrƒÅ, with this lamenting verse, and in an instant, in a moment, a rain the size of a yoke fell from the noble one's hand,

original: mtsho nang gi padma ltar gyur to zhes grag go //
analyzed: mtsho nang gi padma ltar gyur to zhes grag go //
translated: And it is said that he became like a lotus in the lake.

original: panti ta sh'akya shr'i dang lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
analyzed: panti ta sh'akya shr'i dang lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
translated: It is completed.
